Job Title: IT Business Consultant - Cybersecurity

Location: Charleston, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Aufgaben

Shape the future today.

The world is changing. The question is, what will be our contribution to the outcome? We have set the pace in the field of mobility from the very beginning, and we will continue to do so. At Mercedes-Benz Vans, interdisciplinary teams are developing the mobility of tomorrow. Our goal is to make mobility safer, simpler, and more sustainable for people across the globe. Put your pioneering spirit to good use: This is your opportunity to make a contribution that extends far beyond your job title.

At Mercedes-Benz Vans, we offer you the perfect environment for your professional and personal growth. Cutting-edge training and promising career opportunities will help you to foster and expand your professional skill set as well as your individual strengths. Think, try, and thrive with us in collaborative work environments that spark game-changing concepts.

Job Overview:

The Business Consultant accompanies the business partner throughout the entire IT Demand Management process as ‘One Face to the Customer’. Researches, implements and coordinates changes to improve/optimize Mercedes-Benz Vans’ business processes. Provides functional IT support and is responsible for creating and maintaining internal IT processes and documentation. Ensures sustainable availability, integrity and confidentiality of all IT applications in their area.

Responsibilities:

Provides IT support during incidents Conducts analysis of client’s business and functional requirements and binds them with business processesAssesses scope and impact of client business needs and assists with formal requirement documentationSupports IT changes and releasesCreates and manages timelines and implementation plansStudies the impact and benefits of technologyAcquires, improves and applies a broad toolkit of best practices and methodologiesSelects and applies analysis methods (actual analysis) Supports in determining the target state by applying creative, agile methods and proceduresOrganizes and supports workshops to derive the target solution on the basis of the target stateCoordination of the involved areas (IT and Business Partner) during the development, testing and rollout of the target solutionSupports and maintains internal IT processes (ex: Incident Management) and associated documentationSupports thorough problem management as the coordinator after incidents including in-depth Root Cause Analysis, Countermeasures and Solution planningMay be required to provide after-hours / on-call duty support Participate in the plant expansion and other projects.Participate in regular scheduled team meetingsPerforms other duties as assigned 

Qualifikationen

Qualifications:

High School Diploma or GED and 5 years of relevant working experience

or

Associate’s degree and 2-4 years of relevant working experience.

or

Bachelor's degree and 0-2 years of relevant working experience.

Preferably a Bachelor's or Associate’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related filed.

Knowledge and Skills:

Experience in IT Demand Management/Business Consulting is a plusExcellent communication and presentation skillsProject Management (leading projects, major changes/releases or work packages)Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skillsBasic to Intermediate technical skillsBasic understanding of IT security and data securityKnowledge of incident and problem management is a plusKnowledgeable in agile methodology and principles preferred. 

We are all in for change. Are you too? Apply now.

If you have experience in the above and are interested in joining an outstanding company we welcome you to apply. The division Mercedes-Benz Vans is world renown for quality and innovative products.

EXCELLENT COMPENSATION & BENEFITS PLAN WITH 401k MATCHING

Mercedes-Benz Vans, LLC is committed to fostering an inclusive environment that appreciates and leverages the diversity of our team.
